item.title: Adding Authorized Domains to Firebase Auth
item.description: In my experience, Firebase Authentication is a relatively straightforward tool to provide federated (e.g. Google, Microsoft, Twitter etc.) authentication. I’m using it to manage identities for an app that I’m building where I need web and gRPC auth. Firebase Auth provides a JWT that I can then funnel through Google’s Cloud Endpoints to authenticate gRPC services. Firebase Auth configuration is biased towards the Firebase Console but I wanted to be able to programmatically revise the list of Authorized Domains.
